quiz.question: secretive ______
quiz.explanation: secretive 秘密的,秘密的一瞥。The spy cast a secretive glance toward the hidden microphone in the corner.间谍向角落里隐藏的麦克风投去秘密的一瞥。

quiz.question: attentive _______
quiz.explanation: attentive 专心的,专心的学生。The attentive student took detailed notes during every lecture.这位专心的学生在每堂课上都做详细的笔记。

quiz.question: inattentive ______
quiz.explanation: inattentive 不注意的,不注意的司机。The inattentive driver nearly caused an accident by failing to notice the stop sign.不注意的司机因为没注意到停车标志几乎造成了事故。

quiz.question: furtive ____
quiz.explanation: furtive 鬼鬼祟祟的,鬼鬼祟祟的眼神。The thief took a furtive look around before sneaking into the building.小偷在潜入大楼前鬼鬼祟祟地环顾四周。

quiz.question: revive _____
quiz.explanation: revive 复苏,重燃希望。The unexpected donation helped revive hopes for completing the community center.意外的捐赠帮助重燃了完成社区中心的希望。

quiz.question: delve ____
quiz.explanation: delve 钻研,深入研究。The historian decided to delve into ancient manuscripts to uncover forgotten stories.历史学家决定深入研究古代手稿以揭示被遗忘的故事。

quiz.question: shelve _____
quiz.explanation: shelve 搁置,搁置计划。The company had to shelve plans for expansion due to budget constraints.由于预算限制,公司不得不搁置扩张计划。

quiz.question: dissolve _____
quiz.explanation: dissolve 溶解,溶解糖。Stir the tea slowly to dissolve sugar completely in the hot liquid.慢慢搅拌茶以使糖在热液体中完全溶解。

quiz.question: revolve ______
quiz.explanation: revolve 旋转,围绕旋转。The planets revolve around the sun in elliptical orbits.行星以椭圆轨道围绕太阳旋转。

quiz.question: hove ____ ____
quiz.explanation: hove 出现,进入视野。The massive ship hove into view through the morning fog.巨大的船只在晨雾中进入视野。

quiz.question: shove ____
quiz.explanation: shove 推,用力推。The crowd began to shove hard against the barriers to get closer to the stage.人群开始用力推挤栅栏以靠近舞台。

quiz.question: reprove ______
quiz.explanation: reprove 责备,温和地责备。The teacher chose to reprove gently the young child for the minor mistake.老师选择温和地责备这个年幼的孩子犯的小错误。

quiz.question: ________ trove
quiz.explanation: trove 宝藏,宝藏。Archaeologists discovered a treasure trove of ancient artifacts buried beneath the ruins.考古学家在废墟下发现了埋藏的古代文物宝藏。

quiz.question: starve __ _____
quiz.explanation: starve 挨饿,饿死。During the famine, many people would starve to death without international aid.在饥荒期间,没有国际援助许多人会饿死。

quiz.question: swerve _______
quiz.explanation: swerve 突然转向,急剧转向。The driver had to swerve sharply to avoid hitting the deer on the road.司机不得不急剧转向以避免撞到路上的鹿。

quiz.question: mauve _____
quiz.explanation: mauve 淡紫色,淡紫色连衣裙。She wore an elegant mauve dress to the evening gala.她穿着一件优雅的淡紫色连衣裙参加晚会。

quiz.question: __ _ daze
quiz.explanation: daze 恍惚,处于恍惚状态。After the accident, he wandered around in a daze, unable to remember what happened.事故发生后,他恍惚地四处游荡,无法记起发生了什么。

quiz.question: laze ______
quiz.explanation: laze 懒散,懒散地闲逛。On Sunday afternoons, they would laze around the house reading magazines.周日下午,他们会在家里懒散地闲逛看杂志。

quiz.question: ___ ablaze
quiz.explanation: ablaze 燃烧,点燃。The arsonist deliberately set ablaze the abandoned warehouse.纵火犯故意点燃了废弃的仓库。

quiz.question: _____ glaze
quiz.explanation: glaze 釉,玻璃釉。The potter applied a beautiful glass glaze to the ceramic vase before firing.陶工在烧制前给陶瓷花瓶涂上了漂亮的玻璃釉。

quiz.question: graze ______
quiz.explanation: graze 放牧,放牧牛群。Farmers would graze cattle in the lush meadows during summer months.农民会在夏季的月份里在郁郁葱葱的草地上放牧牛群。

quiz.question: wheeze _____
quiz.explanation: wheeze 喘息,严重喘息。The elderly man began to wheeze badly after climbing the steep stairs.老人爬完陡峭的楼梯后开始严重喘息。

quiz.question: sneeze ______
quiz.explanation: sneeze 打喷嚏,大声打喷嚏。The allergic reaction made him sneeze loudly throughout the entire meeting.过敏反应使他在整个会议期间大声打喷嚏。

quiz.question: ______ trapeze
quiz.explanation: trapeze 空中秋千,飞行空中秋千。The circus performer amazed audiences with daring stunts on the flying trapeze.马戏团表演者在飞行空中秋千上表演大胆的特技,让观众惊叹不已。

quiz.question: scandalize ______
quiz.explanation: scandalize 使震惊,使公众震惊。The politician's controversial remarks would scandalize public opinion nationwide.这位政治家有争议的言论会使全国公众舆论震惊。

quiz.question: socialize ____
quiz.explanation: socialize 社交,与人社交。After work, colleagues would socialize with each other at the local pub.下班后,同事们会在当地酒吧与彼此社交。

quiz.question: idolize ____
quiz.explanation: idolize 崇拜,崇拜英雄。Young fans would idolize hero athletes and collect their memorabilia.年轻的粉丝会崇拜英雄运动员并收集他们的纪念品。

quiz.question: patronize ____
quiz.explanation: patronize 光顾,光顾商店。Local residents continue to patronize shop owned by the friendly neighborhood baker.当地居民继续光顾友好的邻里面包师拥有的商店。

quiz.question: fraternize ____ _____
quiz.explanation: fraternize 亲善,与敌人亲善。Military regulations strictly forbid soldiers to fraternize with enemy combatants.军事法规严格禁止士兵与敌方战斗人员亲善。

quiz.question: outsize ______
quiz.explanation: outsize 超大的,超大的夹克。He accidentally bought an outsize jacket that hung loosely on his frame.他不小心买了一件超大的夹克,松松垮垮地挂在他身上。

quiz.question: hypnotize _______
quiz.explanation: hypnotize 催眠,催眠受试者。The trained therapist used relaxation techniques to hypnotize subject during the session.训练有素的治疗师在治疗期间使用放松技巧催眠受试者。

quiz.question: doze ___
quiz.explanation: doze 打瞌睡,打瞌睡。The tired student began to doze off during the lengthy afternoon lecture.疲倦的学生在漫长的下午讲座期间开始打瞌睡。

quiz.question: ooze ___
quiz.explanation: ooze 渗出,渗出。Dark liquid began to ooze out from the crack in the old barrel.黑色的液体开始从旧桶的裂缝中渗出。

quiz.question: snooze _____
quiz.explanation: snooze 小睡,小睡闹钟。He hit the snooze alarm three times before finally getting out of bed.他按了三次小睡闹钟才终于起床。

quiz.question: sheaf __ ______
quiz.explanation: sheaf 一捆,一捆纸张。The lawyer carried a thick sheaf of papers into the courtroom.律师带着厚厚的一捆纸张走进法庭。

quiz.question: ___ oaf
quiz.explanation: oaf 笨蛋,大笨蛋。The clumsy big oaf knocked over the expensive vase with his elbow.笨拙的大笨蛋用胳膊肘撞倒了昂贵的花瓶。

quiz.question: loaf __ _____
quiz.explanation: loaf 条,一条面包。She bought a fresh loaf of bread from the bakery for breakfast.她从面包店买了一条新鲜的面包作为早餐。

quiz.question: riffraff _____
quiz.explanation: riffraff 乌合之众,乌合之众。The exclusive club tried to keep out the riffraff crowd with strict membership rules.这家高档俱乐部试图用严格的会员规则挡住乌合之众。

quiz.question: whiff __ _______
quiz.explanation: whiff 一丝气味,一丝香水味。She caught a whiff of perfume as the elegant woman walked past.当优雅的女士走过时,她闻到了一丝香水味。

quiz.question: ____ _______ / miff
quiz.explanation: miff 恼怒,生气。His thoughtless comment made her take offense and leave the party early.他粗心的评论让她生气并提前离开了聚会。

quiz.question: sniff ______
quiz.explanation: sniff 嗅,四处嗅探。The curious dog began to sniff around the garden looking for buried bones.好奇的狗开始在花园里四处嗅探寻找埋藏的骨头。

quiz.question: ____ midriff
quiz.explanation: midriff 上腹部,裸露的上腹部。The dancer wore a costume with a bare midriff that showed her toned stomach.舞者穿着一件裸露上腹部的服装,展示了她健美的腹部。

quiz.question: scoff __
quiz.explanation: scoff 嘲笑,嘲笑。Critics would scoff at his unconventional artistic style and bold ideas.批评家们会嘲笑他非传统的艺术风格和大胆的想法。

quiz.question: ___ payoff
quiz.explanation: payoff 回报,巨大的回报。Years of hard work finally resulted in a big payoff when the business succeeded.多年的辛勤工作最终在生意成功时获得了巨大的回报。

quiz.question: ____ rebuff
quiz.explanation: rebuff 拒绝,给予拒绝。The committee decided to give rebuff to the poorly prepared proposal.委员会决定给予这份准备不充分的提案拒绝。

quiz.question: scuff _____
quiz.explanation: scuff 磨损痕迹,磨损痕迹。The polished floor showed ugly scuff marks from students' shoes.抛光的地板上显示出学生鞋子留下的难看的磨损痕迹。

quiz.question: ____ __ guff
quiz.explanation: guff 废话,满是废话。The politician's speech was full of guff and empty promises.这位政治家的演讲满是废话和空洞的承诺。

quiz.question: _____ chuff
quiz.explanation: chuff 喷气声,蒸汽喷气声。The old locomotive made a rhythmic steam chuff as it pulled into the station.老机车驶入车站时发出有节奏的蒸汽喷气声。

quiz.question: ______ fluff
quiz.explanation: fluff 绒毛,棉絮。The pillow was filled with soft cotton fluff for maximum comfort.枕头里填满了柔软的棉絮以获得最大的舒适度。

quiz.question: ____ earmuff
quiz.explanation: earmuff 耳套,温暖的耳套。She put on warm earmuffs to protect her ears from the freezing wind.她戴上温暖的耳套以保护耳朵免受冰冻的风。

quiz.question: snuff ___
quiz.explanation: snuff 熄灭,熄灭。The dictator tried to snuff out all opposition to his brutal regime.独裁者试图熄灭对他残暴政权的所有反对。

quiz.question: ruff ______
quiz.explanation: ruff 环状皱领,环状皱领。The Elizabethan portrait showed a noble wearing an elaborate ruff collar.伊丽莎白时代的肖像显示一位贵族穿着精致的环状皱领。

quiz.question: ____ scruff
quiz.explanation: scruff 颈背,颈背。The mother cat picked up her kitten by the neck scruff to move it to safety.母猫抓住小猫的颈背把它移到安全的地方。

quiz.question: gruff _____
quiz.explanation: gruff 粗哑的,粗哑的声音。The old sea captain spoke in a gruff voice that commanded respect.老船长用粗哑的声音说话,令人尊敬。

quiz.question: engulf ______
quiz.explanation: engulf 吞没,火焰吞没。The fire quickly began to engulf flames the entire wooden structure.火灾迅速开始让火焰吞没整个木结构。

quiz.question: _____ hoof
quiz.explanation: hoof 蹄,马蹄。The blacksmith carefully examined the horse hoof before fitting the new shoe.铁匠在安装新蹄铁之前仔细检查了马蹄。

quiz.question: _____ spoof
quiz.explanation: spoof 滑稽模仿,电影滑稽模仿。The comedy troupe created a hilarious movie spoof of classic horror films.喜剧团创作了一个经典恐怖电影的滑稽模仿。

quiz.question: carpetbag ________
quiz.explanation: carpetbag 外来投机的,外来投机政治。The corrupt politician was accused of engaging in carpetbag politics for personal gain.腐败的政治家被指控为个人利益从事外来投机政治。

quiz.question: ___ hag
quiz.explanation: hag 丑老太婆,老丑婆。The fairy tale featured an old hag who lived alone in the haunted forest.童话故事中有一个住在鬼森林里的老丑婆。

quiz.question: jag __ _____
quiz.explanation: jag 一阵,一阵睡眠。After working all night, he desperately needed a jag of sleep to recover.工作了一整夜后,他迫切需要一阵睡眠来恢复。

quiz.question: nag __________
quiz.explanation: nag 唠叨,不断唠叨。His mother would nag constantly about cleaning his messy room.他的母亲会不断唠叨要他打扫凌乱的房间。

quiz.question: ___ _ snag
quiz.explanation: snag 障碍,遇到障碍。The construction project hit a snag when unexpected underground cables were discovered.当发现意外的地下电缆时,建设项目遇到了障碍。

quiz.question: ____ sag
quiz.explanation: sag 下垂,皮肤下垂。As people age, their skin sag naturally due to loss of elasticity.随着年龄的增长,人们的皮肤由于失去弹性而自然下垂。

quiz.question: ____ wag
quiz.explanation: wag 摇摆,尾巴摇摆。The excited puppy would tail wag furiously whenever its owner came home.每当主人回家时,兴奋的小狗会疯狂地摇尾巴。

quiz.question: ______ scalawag
quiz.explanation: scalawag 无赖,无赖流氓。The mischievous rascal scalawag stole apples from the neighbor's orchard.淘气的无赖流氓从邻居的果园偷苹果。

quiz.question: ____ dreg
quiz.explanation: dreg 渣滓,酒渣。At the bottom of the bottle, only bitter wine dregs remained.在瓶底,只剩下苦涩的酒渣。

quiz.question: _____ jig
quiz.explanation: jig 吉格舞,爱尔兰吉格舞。The musicians played a lively Irish jig at the traditional wedding celebration.音乐家们在传统的婚礼庆祝活动上演奏了一首活泼的爱尔兰吉格舞曲。

quiz.question: ____ _ swig
quiz.explanation: swig 大口喝,喝一大口。The thirsty hiker paused to take a swig from his water bottle.口渴的徒步旅行者停下来从水瓶里喝一大口。

quiz.question: ____ twig
quiz.explanation: twig 细枝,树枝。A small bird perched on a delicate tree twig swaying in the breeze.一只小鸟栖息在微风中摇曳的细树枝上。

quiz.question: ____ clang
quiz.explanation: clang 铿锵声,响亮的铿锵声。The metal gate closed with a loud clang that echoed through the empty street.金属大门关上时发出响亮的铿锵声,在空荡的街道上回响。

quiz.question: _____ pang
quiz.explanation: pang 剧痛,剧烈疼痛。She felt a sharp pang of guilt for forgetting her friend's birthday.她因忘记朋友的生日而感到一阵剧烈的内疚。

quiz.question: _____ twang
quiz.explanation: twang 弦声,班卓琴弦声。The musician plucked the strings creating a distinctive banjo twang.音乐家拨动琴弦,发出独特的班卓琴弦声。

quiz.question: ____ gilding
quiz.explanation: gilding 镀金,金箔镀金。The ancient manuscript featured intricate gold gilding on its illuminated pages.这份古代手稿在其装饰性页面上有精致的金箔镀金。

quiz.question: wending ___
quiz.explanation: wending 蜿蜒前进,蜿蜒前进的路。The travelers were wending way through the narrow mountain paths at sunset.旅行者们在日落时分沿着狭窄的山路蜿蜒前进。

quiz.question: astounding _______
quiz.explanation: astounding 惊人的,惊人的成功。The startup achieved astounding success within just two years of launching.这家初创公司在推出仅两年内就取得了惊人的成功。

quiz.question: foreboding _____
quiz.explanation: foreboding 不祥的,不祥的预感。She had a foreboding sense that something terrible was about to happen.她有一种不祥的预感,觉得可怕的事情即将发生。

quiz.question: disobliging ______
quiz.explanation: disobliging 不友好的,不友好的评论。His disobliging remark offended several guests at the dinner party.他不友好的评论冒犯了晚宴上的几位客人。

quiz.question: scathing _________
quiz.explanation: scathing 严厉的,严厉的批评。The film received scathing criticism from reviewers for its poor plot.这部电影因其糟糕的情节受到评论家的严厉批评。

quiz.question: troubling _____
quiz.explanation: troubling 令人不安的,令人不安的时期。The nation faced troubling times of economic uncertainty and social unrest.国家面临着经济不确定性和社会动荡的令人不安的时期。

quiz.question: cling _______
quiz.explanation: cling 紧贴,紧紧抓住。The frightened child would cling tightly to her mother during the thunderstorm.受惊的孩子在雷暴期间会紧紧抓住她的母亲。

quiz.question: _____ seedling
quiz.explanation: seedling 幼苗,年幼的幼苗。The gardener carefully transplanted the young seedling into rich soil.园丁小心地将年幼的幼苗移植到肥沃的土壤中。

quiz.question: _____ peeling
quiz.explanation: peeling 果皮,水果果皮。She tossed the orange fruit peeling into the compost bin.她把橙子的果皮扔进了堆肥箱。

quiz.question: fling ____
quiz.explanation: fling 猛地打开,猛地打开。The angry man would fling open the door and storm out of the room.愤怒的男人会猛地打开门,冲出房间。

quiz.question: scuffling _____
quiz.explanation: scuffling 扭打,扭打的声音。The detective heard a scuffling noise coming from the dark alley.侦探听到从黑暗的小巷传来扭打的声音。

quiz.question: _____ railing
quiz.explanation: railing 栏杆,金属栏杆。She gripped the metal railing tightly while climbing the steep staircase.她在爬陡峭的楼梯时紧紧抓住金属栏杆。

quiz.question: appalling _____
quiz.explanation: appalling 骇人听闻的,骇人听闻的罪行。The newspaper reported the appalling crime that shocked the entire community.报纸报道了震惊整个社区的骇人听闻的罪行。

quiz.question: _____ sapling
quiz.explanation: sapling 树苗,年轻的树苗。The forest service planted young saplings to restore the burned area.林业局种植年轻的树苗来恢复被烧毁的区域。

quiz.question: sling ___
quiz.explanation: sling 吊带,吊带包。The messenger wore a leather sling bag across his shoulder for carrying documents.信使肩上斜挎着一个皮革吊带包用来携带文件。

quiz.question: startling ____
quiz.explanation: startling 惊人的,惊人的消息。The announcement contained startling news about the company's merger plans.该公告包含了关于公司合并计划的惊人消息。

quiz.question: whistling _____
quiz.explanation: whistling 口哨,口哨声。A cheerful whistling sound came from the kitchen as he prepared breakfast.当他准备早餐时,厨房里传来欢快的口哨声。

quiz.question: oncoming _______
quiz.explanation: oncoming 迎面而来的,迎面而来的车辆。The driver swerved to avoid the oncoming traffic in his lane.司机转向以避开他车道上迎面而来的车辆。

quiz.question: alarming ____
quiz.explanation: alarming 惊人的,惊人的速度。The disease was spreading at an alarming rate throughout the region.这种疾病正以惊人的速度在整个地区蔓延。

quiz.question: ____ fastening
quiz.explanation: fastening 系紧,系紧腰带。Before takeoff, passengers must ensure proper belt fastening for safety.起飞前,乘客必须确保安全地系紧腰带。

quiz.question: _____ scraping
quiz.explanation: scraping 刮擦,金属刮擦。The irritating metal scraping sound came from the old machinery.恼人的金属刮擦声来自旧机器。

quiz.question: ____ chipping
quiz.explanation: chipping 削屑,木屑。The carpenter created a pile of wood chipping while carving the sculpture.木匠在雕刻雕塑时产生了一堆木屑。

quiz.question: ____ nipping
quiz.explanation: nipping 刺骨的,刺骨的寒冷。The cold nipping wind made everyone hurry indoors for warmth.刺骨的寒风让每个人都匆忙进屋取暖。

quiz.question: blundering ____
quiz.explanation: blundering 笨拙的,笨拙的傻瓜。The blundering fool accidentally deleted all the important files.这个笨拙的傻瓜不小心删除了所有重要文件。

quiz.question: _________ fluttering
quiz.explanation: fluttering 飘动,蝴蝶飘动。The colorful butterfly fluttering among the flowers caught everyone's attention.在花丛中飘动的彩色蝴蝶吸引了所有人的注意。

quiz.question: jarring _____
quiz.explanation: jarring 刺耳的,刺耳的噪音。The jarring noise from construction work disrupted the peaceful neighborhood.建筑工程发出的刺耳噪音扰乱了宁静的街区。

quiz.question: wring _____
quiz.explanation: wring 扭绞,扭绞双手。The worried mother would wring hands anxiously while waiting for news.忧心忡忡的母亲在等待消息时会焦急地扭绞双手。
